organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Australia was the only dollar-bloc country in the table to eke out a positive return , albeit a paltry 0.02 percent .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Australia |
| dollar-bloc |

In this paragraph, "Australia" is the only explicitly mentioned organization. "dollar-bloc" is also mentioned, but it is a group or category of countries, not a specific organization. Therefore, only "Australia" is identified as an organization in this paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Australia |
| dollar-bloc (as a group or category of countries) |

However, since the paragraph only mentions "Australia" as a specific organization, the table would look the same as the previous one if we focus only on explicitly mentioned organizations.

If we strictly follow the instruction to remove entities that do not clearly refer to organizations, then "dollar-bloc" should not be included in the table as it is not an organization but a group or category of countries. Therefore, the table should only contain "Australia" as the organization mentioned in the paragraph.
